sentences.english: Car-following is an ubiquitous traffic phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 車輛跟馳是普遍存在的交通現象之一。

sentences.english: Last, It proves the congruity between the kinetic model and the car-following theory.
sentences.chinese: 論證了該模型與車輛跟馳理論是統一的。

sentences.english: Car-following model is the core of microscope traffic simulations.
sentences.chinese: 車輛跟馳模型是微觀交通仿真的核心。
